page.title: 01CRANFIELD
page.content: { Cranfield} is in the county of Bedfordshire close to the border with Buckinghamshire. Seven miles to the north-east is Bedford, the county town of Bedfordshire Although most of the area is farm- land the main feature is tthe "Cranfield Institute of Technology" and its accompanying airfield. To the west of Cranfield is the new city of{ Milton Keynes} which they started to build around 1971 with an estimated final population of 250,000. At the moment{ Milton Keynes} is only partly finished and even with its busy shopping centre it is ranked 87th in "Top shops" list,which is a survey of Britain's top shops and shopping centres. The City has a great influence on the working and social life of the people of {Cranfield.}
